title: Life After Marrying My Love Rival - Novel Updates
tags: Betrayal   Drugs   Enemies Become Lovers   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Prostit**es   Revenge   R*pe   Secret Organizations   Secretive Protagonist   Showbiz   Slow Romance   Suicides
author: Qing Duan   青端
description:
Ye Nanqi and Shen Du upgraded from being enemies to love rivals, fighting against each other for the affections of a white moonlight. Except, on the day of the white moonlight’s wedding, they ended up rolling together on the bed, and unexpectedly got married to each other.

After the marriage, the two thought of countless ways to make the other party be the one who asks for divorce, but when Ye Nanqi took on the role of the “bad husband” by bringing up divorce first, his love rival changed his mind.

Shen Du: “Not divorcing.”

Ye Nanqi: “…”

Shen Du: “Not even in death will we part.”

The white moonlight, “???”>
